attributes.action: Be Granted 20 Ackes Of Your Own Land For Free, To Help Maintian And Preserve The Land!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To own and live on 20 ackes of land for free! And in return, this land is to be maintianed and presevered and kepted Tidy! These 20 ackes of land, can be anything like: Woodlands, part Fields and part Woodlands or Waste Land! This way, you will be doing your part for the enviroment, this will also cut down on the crime we have today, by applying for this land, it will help people to understand, about how we are distroying this world! Aswell as living on your 20 ackes of land, you are learning the knowlege of this world!! But in order to do this, you will need to have a writen Contract and for it to be signed by you and the Government, to say that you will abide by the law of the land and the rules!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
